Replace.Text: Only one can be built in a city, even if the city has multiple Ægir fishing village. The culture [ICON_Culture] bonus equals the adjacent [ICON_Production] production bonus from the Ægir fishing village.
Gain [ICON_GreatGeneral] Great General points equal to 5% [ICON_Strength] Military Strength. Unlocks the unique unit Hatamoto Samurai.
Gain [ICON_Faith] Faith equal to 25% [ICON_Strength] Military Strength and 5% [ICON_Strength] Military Strength for [ICON_GreatProphet] Great Prophet points.
Gain [ICON_Science] Science and [ICON_FAVOR] Diplomatic Support equal to 5% of [ICON_Strength] Military Strength. Unlocks the unique unit Noir Corne.
Gain [ICON_Gold] gold equal to 25% of [ICON_Strength] military strength. Gain 1 free merchant after have Foreign Trade civic.

A district unique to Higashi. Replaces the holy site district, and cheaper to build. Additional +0.5 [ICON_Faith] Faith from Adjacent forest and +1 [ICON_Faith] Faith value from Adjacent Lumber Mill. When the first Oppidum is constructed the Construction technology is unlocked.

A district unique to Higashi, can only be built on coastal or lake. Replaces the Neighborhood district but is available earlier and cheaper to build. Provides +5 [ICON-Housing] Housing regardless of Appeal. +1 [ICON_Food] Food and 1 [ICON_Production] Production from Adjacent reefs, fishing boats and Fisheries.

Akafuyu unique unit. Does not suffer combat penalties when damaged. Obtained when obtaining the Grand General. Has base Combat Strength equal to the strongest unit your cities have produced. When killed, retreats with 1 HP to the [ICON_Capital] Capital.

Yato unique unit. When they eliminate a unit, they heal up to 50 hit points. Has base Combat Strength equal to the strongest unit your cities have produced. When killed, retreats with 1 HP to the [ICON_Capital] Capital.
Gain [ICON_Culture] culture equal to 5% [ICON_Strength] military strength.
Adjacent Lumber Mill tiles provide +{1_num} [ICON_Faith] Faith.
Adjacent Fishing Boats tiles provide +{1_num} [ICON_Food] Food.
Adjacent Fishing Boats tiles provide +{1_num} [ICON_Production] Production.

The brave Akafuyu, you are a general of the Northern Dynasties, and your task is to unify the surrounding Southern and Northern Dynasties into one empire. You are a born military leader—use your skills to bring these cities under your control so that they may develop into powerful commercial and industrial nations, proving your loyalty to the ruler.

The Eastern Kingdom's people were once of great nobility. Suzuran, your people truly understand how to maintain balance, and even your best warriors are scholarly and spiritually rich. Strong and faithful, you will achieve great things.

Your responsibility is great, Yato. Many people in the Eastern Kingdom are still in distress, and they see you as their savior. Of course, this heavy task will not be yours alone, as Noir Corne will accompany you in this mission.

The responsibility falls on your shoulders, Utage. Return to your homeland and transform this isolated place with capital and fashion. Under your rule, the Eastern Kingdom will prosper and expand continuously, absorbing all surrounding lands. Perhaps, you will even create the greatest empire the world has ever seen.
Not just heads, even bloodlust can be severed!
Since the task has been entrusted to me, this mission will surely succeed.
If you don't need the spare parts, just give them to me.
Always striving to maintain a powerful standing army. Respect other civilizations with large armies.
Strive to gain [ICON_Faith] Faith points, prefers civilizations that also focus on [ICON_Faith] Faith points.
Strive to gain [ICON_Science] Science points, prefers civilizations that also focus on [ICON_Science] Science points.
Earn the most [ICON_Gold] Gold from income every turn. Respects other civilizations with high income.
A stronger enemy? You deserve my respect.
I'm telling you, if you're my enemy, you'd be in two pieces by now!
I see, I think we can do better. I'll work hard on it.
I think you can do better too. I can guide you.
Your level of technology impresses me.
You really should start paying attention to what's happening around you. Your level is nowhere near others'.
Your taste is truly enviable, can you teach me?
Everyone else is yearning for prosperity, but you are stuck in your ways.
When they eliminate a unit, they heal up to 50 hit points.
When they eliminate a unit, they heal up to 50 hit points.
You should have done this earlier. Come at me, anyone who dares will be slain by my sword!
Maybe you can fool others, but I won't believe such a trickster like you. (Denouncing you)
Akafuyu, a swordsman, the strongest of them all. My sword? No matter where I am, I will never put it down. Haha, if you're scared, stay back.
You are an evil seed. You must be destroyed.
The whole world should know your sins. (Denouncing you)
Rhodes Island operator, Lisa... oh no, it's Suzuran, don’t mind my tail.
Target confirmed, I will finish this quickly.
A tyrant like you is despicable. Your people will know I speak the truth. (Denouncing you)
Leader of the action team, Yato. On a mission. Since it was entrusted to me, this operation will surely succeed.
Come on, come on, I can't wait anymore.
For the greater good. You will understand in time.
I dislike your recent actions. What will your friends think? (Denouncing you)
Utage, nice to meet you. Please take care of me from now on.
